title: AI-focused roles lead new tech hirings in India
description: Tech and AI firms are rapidly increasing hiring, with AI-first roles leading new job postings as businesses accelerate adoption of artificial intelligence. Demand for specialists in data architecture, machine learning, and generative AI is surging, making India a key global hub due to its deep technical talent base.

title: Mistake-filled legal briefs show the limits of relying on AI tools at work
description: Judges around the world are dealing with a growing problem: legal briefs that were generated with the help of artificial intelligence and submitted with errors such as citations to cases that don't exist, according to attorneys and court documents.
content: NEW YORK: Judges around the world are dealing with a growing problem: legal briefs that were generated with the help of artificial intelligence and submitted with errors such as citations to cases that don’t exist, according to attorneys and court do... [6520 chars]
